description:
Run the ridge less traveled by. The La Sportiva Jackal lets you tackle the terrain where the wild things are. Its super-thick midsole is engineered for shock absorption over long or short distances. A varied outsole grabs the ground and protects from sharp edges, so you can channel your energy into gaining elevation and putting the miles behind you. With a protective toe cap and roomy mesh upper, these airy shoes are crafted for the feet of mountain runners. Cushion plus stability, it's the sky running dream.

  • Nearly seamless mesh upper eliminates points of friction
  • Gussetted soft-stretch tongue moves with your foot
  • Ripstop reinforcements strengthens the upper and allows easy ventilation
  • EVA midsoles cushion against repeated impacts on long runs
  • Infinitoo PU insert stabilizes your stride
  • 4mm Ortholite insole adds extra cushioning
  • Dual density EVA Rock-Guard protectss the sole of your foot from sharp edges
  • Frixion XT 2.0 rubber outsole gives reliable traction
  • TPU toe cap protects your toes
  • Wide fit for long distance trail running
name: La Sportiva Jackal Gore-Tex Trail Running Shoes - Men's
